mapper.select: SELECT b.board_idx , b.board_title , b.member_idx , typ.code_name as board_type , DATE_FORMAT(b.board_create_at, '%Y-%m-%d') AS board_create_at , b.board_viewcnt , b.cmt_count FROM board b LEFT JOIN common_code typ ON b.board_type = typ.code WHERE member_idx = #{memberIdx} ORDER BY b.board_idx DESC LIMIT #{startRow}, #{listLimit}
